turkish_example_sentence: O beyaz kar dağını görmezse hayal kırıklığına uğrar.
english_example_sentence: If she were not to see the white snowy mountain, she would be disappointed.
russian_example_sentence: Если она не увидит белую снежную гору, она будет разочарована.
